menu_category_code, hamburger_name as menu_name, hamburger_category_code, mc_lunch_flag, 'burger' as menu_category_name
menu_category_code, side_menu_name as menu_name, size, set_menu_flag, only_mc_morning_flag, 'side' as menu_category_name, mc_morning_flag as is_mc_morning_flag
menu_category_code, drink_name as menu_name, size, set_menu_flag, drink_category_code, only_mc_morning_flag, 'drink' as menu_category_name, mc_morning_flag as is_mc_morning_flag
menu_category_code, dessert_name as menu_name, only_mc_morning_flag, 'dessert' as menu_category_name, mc_morning_flag as is_mc_morning_flag
from

mapper.delete:

side_menu_table
drink_table
dessert_table

mapper.select: SELECT id, hamburger_name as menu_name, price, kcal, image FROM hamburger_table WHERE hamburger_category_code = -1 and id = #{id};
SELECT id, hamburger_name as menu_name, price, kcal, image, true as mc_morning_flag FROM hamburger_table WHERE hamburger_category_code = -1;

SELECT id,
side_menu_name AS menu_name,
drink_name AS menu_name,
price, price as default_price, kcal, image FROM
side_menu_table
drink_table
WHERE mc_morning_flag = 1
AND set_menu_flag = 1 and (size LIKE 'm' or size LIKE 'none')
;

choose.when:
SELECT smt.id,
smt.side_menu_name AS menu_name,
if(size LIKE 'none', smt.side_menu_name, concat(smt.side_menu_name, ' - ', if(smt.size LIKE 'M', '미디엄', '라지'))) AS menu_name,
if(smt.price - smt2.price < 0, 0, smt.price - smt2.price) AS price, smt.price as default_price, smt.kcal, smt.image FROM side_menu_table smt LEFT OUTER JOIN(select price from side_menu_table where side_menu_name LIKE '해시브라운') smt2 ON(1 = 1) WHERE smt.set_menu_flag = 1
and smt.mc_morning_flag = 1 and (size LIKE 'm' or size LIKE 'none')
and smt.mc_morning_flag = 0
;
choose.otherwise:
SELECT dt.id,
dt.drink_name AS menu_name,
if(dt.size LIKE 'none', dt.drink_name, concat(dt.drink_name, ' - ', if(dt.size LIKE 'M', '미디엄', '라지'))) AS menu_name,
if(dt.price - dt2.price < 0, 0, dt.price - dt2.price) AS price, dt.price as default_price, dt.kcal, dt.image FROM drink_table dt LEFT OUTER JOIN(select price from drink_table where drink_name LIKE '코카콜라' and size LIKE #{size}) dt2 ON(1 = 1) WHERE
dt.mc_morning_flag = 1 and (size LIKE 'm' or size LIKE 'none')
size LIKE #{size} and dt.mc_morning_flag = 1
;
